participant_1.background:
I am a very private person and do not discuss my family.
i blog about salt water aquarium ownership.
I'm not much of a social media person, because I like to focus on my work and my hobbies.
i hate mexican food.
i am a guitar player.

participant_2.background:
I gave my doberman a treat for being a good boy.
I want to learn how to let things go and not be so hard on myself.
I treat myself to something I've been wanting.
I am content with my solitary lifestyle and enjoy spending time with my pets.
I loved playing with my brother when we were kids.

content.text: Hi, what are you up to today?
I just gave my Doberman a treat for being a good boy.  How about you?
Just working on my blog about salt water aquarium ownership.
I've never had an aquarium, but I have always wanted one.
They are a lot of work, but they are very rewarding.
I'm sure they are.  I love animals.
Me too.  I have two cats and a guitar.  I love to play guitar.
That's awesome.  I used to play guitar when I was a kid.  I should really pick it back up.
You should!  It's a great way to relax.
I know it is.  I'm going to go to the store and buy a guitar today.
That's great!  I'm sure you'll enjoy it.
Thanks!  I'm excited to start playing again.
